summary: Defines an abstract base class that models a logical collection of related features in the Feast SDK. It encapsulates feature definitions, metadata such as ownership and timestamps, and provides methods for validation, projection, and serialization to protobuf and JSON formats.
business_intent: Allow developers to create, manage, and validate feature view specifications consistently across different feature view types (e.g., regular, onâ€‘demand, stream) within Feast, ensuring correct metadata handling and seamless integration with the Feast core services.
